tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE shipment_tracking (
  shipment_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  estimated_delivery_date DATE,
  actual_delivery_date DATE,
  carrier_name VARCHAR(100),
  tracking_number VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_date DATE,
    origin_location VARCHAR(255),
    destination_location VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_info (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT,
    tracking_date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    remarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tracking_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    shipment_date DATE,
    destination_address TEXT,
    current_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE shipments_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT,
    status_change_date TIMESTAMP,
    new_status VARCHAR(50),
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_status VARCHAR(255),
  shipment_date DATE,
  estimated_delivery_date DATE,
  actual_delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_id INT,
  package_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(255),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tracking_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    sender_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    receiver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    delivery_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    update_details VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    update_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE delays (
    delay_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    delay_reason VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    delay_duration INT NOT NULL,
    resolved BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    assigned_to INT NOT NULL,
    deadline DATE NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);
